subject: Sales
title: Pitching to Different Stakeholders
description: Learn Pitching to Different Stakeholders in one minute.

hook.text: The CEO wants vision. The CFO wants ROI. The CTO wants specs. Same product. Three pitches needed.

buildup.text: Different stakeholders judge through different lenses. A single pitch convinces nobody fully.

discovery.text: Map each stakeholder's priorities beforehand. Customize the narrative to address their specific fears.

twist.text: Pitching to the wrong lens is why multi-stakeholder deals stall. The message fails to travel inside.

climax.text: Build modular pitches: a core story with swappable emphasis for vision, finance, or technical buyers.

punchline.text: Same product, different pitch. Match the audience.

quiz.question: Why do single-version pitches fail with multiple stakeholders?
options: Each stakeholder evaluates through a different lens
They cost too much to produce
